questions.query: When comparing with cannular (tubo annular) combustion chambers, annular combustion chambers have...

options.text:
• a lighter construction;
  • less pressure losses due to reduced drag in the flow;
  • less thermal load on the turbine in case of a fuel nozzle failure.

• a stronger construction;
  • a higher flame temperature;
  • better cooling of the nozzle guide vanes.

• a higher attainable compressor discharge pressure;
  • a stronger construction;
  • a better cooling of the nozzle guide vanes.

• a better flame distribution over the circumference of the combustion chamber;
